StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateMedicalStatusDoDMERB]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @MCRCDisposi.onID int = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(30) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_DODMERB] WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID) BEGIN UPDATE [MEDICAL_STATUS_DODMERB] SET [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID] = @MCRCDisposi.onID, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = getdate() WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MEDICAL_STATUS_DODMERB] ([NWA_ID], [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWAID, @MCRCDisposi.onID, @UserLogin, getdate()) END
